text:
Any details about these *Video hosting changes*? We have built some custom triggers based on <https://knowledge.vidyard.com/hc/en-us/articles/360019034753-Using-the-Vidyard-Player-API|Vidyardâ€™s player API>. Will there be a similar player API available?
> _HubSpot will soon have a new video service and will no longer connect to the Vidyard account that was created when you started using HubSpot Video._
I'd assume (and hope) any existing video would still work, and be hosted vis vidyard
